statusTab.name: Status
statusTab.sysclkIpcGetCurrentContextCrash: Could not get the current sys-clk context, please check that it is correctly installed and enabled.
statusTab.updateWarningResultForProfileHandheldCha: because you're using an unofficial charger type.

applicationProfilesTab.name: Application Profiles
applicationProfilesTab.globalDefaultProfileDescriptionListItemT: The application global default configuration does not have a specific configuration. If there is no application configuration at all, it can also be used as a permanent global overclocking configuration.
applicationProfilesTab.itemEmptyUpdateEmptyListLabelText:   You don't have any application installed on your Nintendo Switch.
applicationProfilesTab.profileItemsEmptyUpdateEmptyListLabelTex:   You don't have any application with a defined profile at the moment.

advancedSettingsTab.name: Advanced Settings
advancedSettingsTab.sysclkIpcGetCurrentContextCrash: Could not get the current sys-clk context, please check that it is correctly installed and enabled.
advancedSettingsTab.disclaimerLabel:   Please only alter these settings if you know what you are doing.
advancedSettingsTab.invalidNegativeValueConfigSaveFailedNoti:  Couldn't save configuration: invalid value (is negative)
advancedSettingsTab.notesLable: The minimum configuration selected will ensure that your device remains at least at that minimum level. It is suitable for people who have a high clock in charging configurations and sometimes want to activate these configurations without a charger (for example, selecting "Official Charging Mode" will ensure that your device configuration remains at least in "Official Charging Mode", even if your device is actually in "Handheld Mode"). If the actual configuration is higher than the minimum configuration, the selected minimum configuration does not degrade your actual configuration (for example, selecting "charging mode" does not do anything when inserting a sled (because you are already in a higher configuration).
advancedSettingsTab.csvUpdateIntervalDescription:
How often to update /config/sys-clk/context.csv (in milliseconds)
  Use 0 to disable
advancedSettingsTab.temperatureLogIntervalDescription:
How often to log temperatures (in milliseconds)
  Use 0 to disable
advancedSettingsTab.pollingIntervalDescription: How fast to check and apply profiles (in milliseconds)
